DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate superiority Nepafenac Ophthalmic Suspension , 0.3 % dosed daily relative Nepafenac Vehicle base upon clinical outcome among diabetic participant follow cataract surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Nepafenac Once Daily Macular Edema - Study 2
DOC.criteria: Planned cataract extraction phacoemulsification implantation posterior chamber intraocular lens ; History Type 1 2 diabetes nonproliferative diabetic retinopathy ( NPDR ) ( mild , moderate , severe ) study eye ; Bestcorrected visual acuity ( BCVA ) 73 letter bad study eye expectation improvement surgery ; Understand sign inform consent document ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Preexisting macular edema study eye ; History study eye retinal detachment , wet agerelated macular degeneration , chronic recurrent inflammatory eye disease , prior procedure ; Planned cataract surgery fellow eye prior Day 90 postoperative study visit study exit ; Planned multiple procedure study eye cataract/intraocular lens ; Use exclusionary medication , include nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) steroid , specify protocol . Participation clinical study within 30 day screen visit ; Females childbearing potential breast feeding , positive urine pregnancy test screening , willing undergo urine pregnancy test upon enter exit study , intend become pregnant study , agree use adequate birth control method duration study ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
